subject: It's my pleasure to inform you
body:
It's my pleasure to inform you that your Customized Consignment Box valued
$40.9M USD was successful registered with (FedEx Company]
for shipment and the
Box was scheduled for delivery directly to your door step and 
you will
send $50 for delivery and insurance coverage paper to ensure successful
delivery. Do reconfirm your below info;
Name: -----------------------------
Address:--------------------------
Country/City:--------------------
Phone:-----------------------------
So i will therefore advise you to use below information and send the
mailing and insurance coverage fee of $50 for immediate dispatching
and release of your tracking
number.
Alternatively, you can send
iTunes Card,
Steam Card,
Amazon for easy and fast payment

subject: Re: It's my pleasure to inform you
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that my Customized Box has been successfully registered with the company and is scheduled for delivery. I'm really looking forward to receiving it.

I understand that there are some fees associated with mailing and insurance coverage. Could you please provide more details about these costs? How much exactly do I need to pay? And could you explain why these specific cards are preferred for payment?

As for the information you asked me to confirm, I'm sorry but I can't share personal details online due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can proceed without sharing this information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Steven
